casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher Don STYLES. No. 442A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 21, 2007. William Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*717The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of November 2007 by Defendant to Continue oral argument:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of November 2007."
